title: my client is glitched
body: when in game my screen does not go full screen and i cant change it it makes it so that i cant see the whole map and i cant move the camera around it makes it really hard to play and i cant fix it. i even uninstalled and it still did not fix the problem please help me

replies.body:
Are you using a 4k screen?  I ask because it's not something currently supported and can cause issues like this.  Your best bet would be to reduce your resolution as a workaround.  You can also try toggling the DPI scaling in compatibility mode to see if that might offer any benefits:

Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

Based on the information provided, I hope that helps!
no im using a lap top and i dont think its the resolution its hard to explain but its i can see the x in the top right

If you're still having this issue, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out.  Provide as much context as possible so we can help with this!
